text: Zapishi za nami v etoy blizhayshey zhizni blagoye deyaniye, i v budushchey; my obratilis' k Tebe!" On skazal: "Nakazaniyem Moim YA porazhayu, kogo zhelayu, a milost' Moya ob"yemlet vsyakuyu veshch'. Poetomu YA zapishu yeye tem, kotoryye bogoboyaznenny, dayut ochishcheniye i kotoryye veruyut v Nashi znameniya
